text: @JoeBiden SYSTEMATIC INSTITUTIONALIZED RACISM is way more of a deadly virus than Covid-19 a pandemic that has been going on for hundreds of years are you going to provide leadership regarding this pandemic or are you going to address the pandemic that is older than you and me put together? https://t.co/bUuJBN0woA
